title: Report a Change in Income for Benefits
description: A citizen receiving SNAP benefits has gotten a new job and needs to report their change in income.

tasks.description: Identify the citizen and their benefits case.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the active SNAP case.

tasks.description: Collect the new income information and supporting documentation (e.g., pay stubs).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately documents the new income details.

tasks.description: Recalculate the citizen's benefit amount based on the new income.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system recalculates the benefits, resulting in a lower monthly amount.

tasks.description: Inform the citizen of their new benefit amount and the date it becomes effective.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the change to the citizen.
